mapper.select: SELECT A.REPORT_NO, A.M_NO, A.BD_NO, D.NAME, C.BD_TITLE, A.REPORT_REASON, A.REPORT_DATE, A.REPORT_SUM FROM REPORT A JOIN IT_MEMBER B ON A.M_NO=B.M_NO JOIN BOARD C ON A.BD_NO=C.BD_NO JOIN BOARDCATEGORY D ON C.BC_CODE=D.CODE ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM REPORT A JOIN IT_MEMBER B ON A.M_NO=B.M_NO JOIN BOARD C ON A.BD_NO=C.BD_NO JOIN BOARDCATEGORY D ON C.BC_CODE=D.CODE ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC WHERE A.REPORT_NO=#{report_no}
